verses.verse: The elder <S%G4245><s%> unto the elect <S%G1588><s%> lady <S%G2959><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> children <S%G5043><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> love <S%G25><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> only <S%G3441><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> they that have known <S%G1097><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%>;

For <S%G1223><s%> the truth's sake <S%G225><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> dwelleth <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%>.

Grace <S%G5485><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, mercy <S%G1656><s%>, and peace <S%G1515><s%>, from <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, the Son <S%G5207><s%> of the Father <S%G3962><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> love <S%G26><s%>. be: Gr. shall be

I rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> greatly <S%G3029><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I found <S%G2147><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> truth <S%G225><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> we have received <S%G2983><s%> a commandment <S%G1785><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> I beseech <S%G2065><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>, lady <S%G2959><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> as though <S%G5613><s%> I wrote <S%G1125><s%> <S%G1125><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> we had <S%G2192><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we love <S%G25><s%> one another <S%G240><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> love <S%G26><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we walk <S%G4043><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> commandments <S%G1785><s%>. This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%>, That <S%G2443><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> ye have heard <S%G191><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%>, ye should walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> it <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> deceivers <S%G4108><s%> are entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> confess <S%G3670><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>. This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> a deceiver <S%G4108><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> an antichrist <S%G500><s%>.

Look <S%G991><s%> to yourselves <S%G1438><s%>, that <S%G3363><s%> we lose <S%G622><s%> not <S%G3363><s%> those things which <S%G3739><s%> we have wrought <S%G2038><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> that we receive <S%G618><s%> a full <S%G4134><s%> reward <S%G3408><s%>. wrought: or, gained, some copies read, ye have gained, but that ye, etc.

Whosoever <S%G3956><s%> transgresseth <S%G3845><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the doctrine <S%G1322><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, hath <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>. He that abideth <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the doctrine <S%G1322><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, he <S%G3778><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%>.

If <S%G1536><s%> there come <S%G2064><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> <S%G5100><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> bring <S%G5342><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> doctrine <S%G1322><s%>, receive <S%G2983><s%> him <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> your house <S%G3614><s%>, neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361><s%> bid <S%G3004><s%> him <S%G846><s%> God speed <S%G5463><s%>:
For <S%G1063><s%> he that biddeth <S%G3004><s%> him <S%G846><s%> God speed <S%G5463><s%> is partaker <S%G2841><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%>.

Having <S%G2192><s%> many things <S%G4183><s%> to write <S%G1125><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, I would <S%G1014><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> write with <S%G1223><s%> paper <S%G5489><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ink <S%G3188><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> I trust <S%G1679><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> face <S%G4750><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> face <S%G4750><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> may be <S%G5600><s%> full <S%G4137><s%>. face to: Gr. mouth to mouth our: or, your
